TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReplicationConnection extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: The class represents a replication connection.

span.span: The class represents a replication connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In servizi di dominio di Active Directory, una connessione di replica Ã¨ rappresentata da un oggetto connessione di NTDS.In Active Directory Domain Services, a replication connection is represented by an NTDS-Connection object. Per altre informazioni, vedere la "[NTDS-Connection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/c_ntdsconnection.asp)" argomento in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).For more information, see the "[NTDS-Connection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/c_ntdsconnection.asp)" topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
